resources.string: Congratulations, you have finished all the setups. Click the button below to start using Kaleidoscope.

Kaleidoscope has built-in Google Services with dynamic switch support, which means you are able to control the existence of them by simply switching the toggle below. You can find the same toggle later in \"Settings > Apps\" after finishing the setup. And remember that do not flash extra GMS packages to avoid breaking any stuff.
Disable Google services may help extend the battery life, but third-party apps relying on GMS components will not work properly.
